uk.ac.glasgow.jagora

Interface Order

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BuyOrder, SellOrder

    public interface Order
    Defines operations for orders on a stock exchange.
    Author:
    tws

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Double getPrice() 
      java.lang.Integer getRemainingQuantity() 
      Stock getStock() 
      Trader getTrader() 
      void rollBackTrade(TickEvent<Trade> tradeEvent)
      Reverts the effects of a trade on this order.
      void satisfyTrade(TickEvent<Trade> tradeEvent)
      Applies a trade to this order and to the underlying trader.

      • getRemainingQuantity

        java.lang.Integer getRemainingQuantity()
        Returns:
        the remaining quantity of stock required to fill this trade.

      • getPrice

        java.lang.Double getPrice()
        Returns:

      • satisfyTrade

        void satisfyTrade(TickEvent<Trade> tradeEvent)
           throws TradeException
        Applies a trade to this order and to the underlying trader.
        Parameters:
        tradeEvent -
        Throws:
        TradeException - if the trade parameters are unacceptable to this trade, or the trader who made the trade cannot satisfy the demand.

        Throws:
